biotools.summary: Server which aims to extract proximal promoter sequences from mammalian genomes.  Does so by mapping mRNA and EST sequences and tracking overlapping alignments to find the transcription start site.

bioschemas.name: PromoSer
bioschemas.summary: Server which aims to extract proximal promoter sequences from mammalian genomes.  Does so by mapping mRNA and EST sequences and tracking overlapping alignments to find the transcription start site.
